website_summaries.verdict: If you are juicing for one to three people, this small, but mighty citrus juicer is exactly what you need.
pros: No, low, and heavy pulp options
Available in a rainbow of colors
Completely extracts juice from each piece of citrus fruit used
cons: Utilizes a fairly small juice pitcher

customer_reviews.title: Lid Latch broke after 15 lemons
customer_reviews.text: Great little juicer until the lid latch broke on the 16th lemon. EDIT: The folks at Vinci were very helpful and promptly replaced the juicer upon hearing of the issue with the latch which appears to be an isolated incident.
customer_reviews.author: North Idaho Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap china make plastic cover that broke
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced cheap plastic juicer, broke after a few uses. Too cover snapped and plastic broke. I tried to attach photo but unable for some reason. Don’t buy this juicer
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely efficient gem!
customer_reviews.text: This product is much more than I could have ever anticipated. It is so easy to use, it extracts every bit of juice and pulp, and so easy to clean up and store. I’ve resisted for many years buying an electric juicer because I just knew they wouldn’t do a good job. Boy, was I surprised. I would have to say we previewed every juicer Priced from $25-$250 and ultimately decided on this one. I believe we were very fortunate to have found this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Simonsmeier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, happy with product!
customer_reviews.text: This juice extractor was easy to operate and clean. I juiced 8 Meyer lemons in less than 20 minutes stopping a few times to clear away the pulp from the strainer. It did not grind into the peel. The spout did not leak. I plan to use the lemon peels to make my own cleaning solution with vinegar. I was so happy with the results and the ease of the product I bought a bag of oranges to juice later in the week. Definitely happy with my purchase, and plan to recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Hagins

customer_reviews.title: Innovative, affordable, easy to clean, look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this juicer. It’s aesthetically pleasing and looks beautiful on my counter top. Unlike other juicers that I’ve owned, It has a unique and innovative design. It is easy to use, efficient and super easy to clean. Most importantly, compared to many others, it is cost effective and affordable. I am certain this will be the last juicer I’ll ever have to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Flores

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Juicer - Easy to Use & Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Although I had to return it - and was sent a replacement - I STILL give it 5 Stars. It is a wonderful orange juice squeezer and I use it every day. Something happened a few days ago and the juicer made a loud noise with two pieces of plastic shooting out across the room. No Problem!!! I contacted Amazon and received a brand new juicer the following day and a code to return the one that broke. That is why I always buy my items on Amazon Prime!!!!!!! Yes - what happened probably was just a fluke. Yes - I Love this juicer and Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Placencia

customer_reviews.title: Made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED the idea of this juicer. It is a wonder!!! But I am sad to say, I am getting a refund because the clear bowl already broke.... the springs and latch. I wish a well respected company would pick up this idea and make it stronger with NO SPRINGS or cheap latch. When it is made stronger, I will definately buy again. I LOVED this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good product, does not stand up to moderate use
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of weekly use several plastic parts have fatigued and ultimately broken. One of the clear base locking flanges at the bottom broke within 2 months. Most recently the round plastic knob holding the rubber gasket at the top has broken. This machine is slowly deconstructing itself with little hope of continued use.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Danet

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This citrus juicer is PERFECT! My family loves fresh juice, and I was getting tired of using a hand press juicer. We needed something compact and easy. The Vinci juicer is a great size with removable parts that I can easily clean. It’s a lot quieter than I expected, too. My kids love watching the juicer in action, and I even let them press the juicer button to start it. You can’t beat fresh juice, and I’m sooo happy I have this juicer now!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I love my Juicer! I am using the Juicer for beverages, like orange juice and lemon aid but also for my cooking needs. What an easy juicer to use.! I love that it is so effective in juicing all the fruit and clean is so easy. Even my kids can use it! Just juice and the parts are dishwasher safe. I am going to buy some for Christmas gifts too!
customer_reviews.author: selma blunk

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Used to have an electric juicer, but I still had to press down on the half citrus fruit. By the time I had finished juicing all the fruit, my fingers would be shriveled. With this juicer, I just cut it in half, close the hatch, press the button, and the machine will figure out how much to juice the fruit. I have to say it does an awesome job. Cool! No more prune fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Someone who cares

customer_reviews.title: HEY! HEY! HEY! I HAVE FALLEN N LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Imagine...fresh orange juice at the push of a button!!! Yup! I love this machine. However, I just purchased it, so...I am hoping I will not experience problems down the road. I made a mess the first time I used it. The instructions could have been better. Anyway, I am now a real pro. I love the fact that it does the extraction. Saves wear and tear on my old hands. Just push a button, and voila it's WONDERFUL. I believe I will keep this machine. If it has problems I purchased the extended. NOW, if you'll excuse I have to get back to my oranges and watching the machine DO ALL THEVWORKI!!! What fun it is I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!
customer_reviews.author: CeeVeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: Man, what a time to be alive. No more hand pressing and juice everywhere! Just slice your oranges, place them in the machine, and press a button. Let the machine do the rest. The closed lid makes clean up a breeze. If you like pulpy oranges, you might want to skip on this though as the strainer doesn't let any pulp through. I end up scooping the fibers in the tray out with a spoon and eating them afterwards. But if you're a pulp-free kind of person, this machine is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Looks fancy, but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had this product 3 months and the pieces are breaking on it....when it works it works great but how is it already broken? Lame
customer_reviews.author: Antoinetta Anselmo

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made
customer_reviews.text: I have has this unit for 2 months & used it 3 times- It worked well but the plastic latch which releases the top portion of the juicer just fell apart today - It should have been made in a fashion that last longer than 3 uses. Don't waste your money- I revised my post after the Company provided such a quick warranty resolution. Once I raised the issue they immediately shipped me a replacement part. This is much appreciated, however, my opinion on the durability of this product still stands, and I would continue to caution future purchasers
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: I. Am. In. Love.
customer_reviews.text: I was smiling as I was using this because it is so easy. I feel like I get wrinkles on my wrists from all the hand lemon juicing I did on my old juicer, and having a hands free juicer to use now completely makes my week!!
customer_reviews.author: MLSG

customer_reviews.title: So Easy!  Love it!  It's Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This juicer replaced my old one that I had over 6 years, that operated manually and electric. It wore me out each time I use it. It was painful to hold the fruit in place as it spend around. This new Juicer is wonderful, so painless and easy to use. My husband had taken it over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Design - OK Materials
customer_reviews.text: I've bought most of the home juicers available and for design this is easily the best. It not only takes the work out of juicing, it does the best job. It gets the most juice out of oranges and it's fast. The material used in its construction is what feels like fragile plastic. No problems so far but I wish it was made out of stainless steel like for example the Breville. I would gladly pay the extra $100. I'm considering buying one for a spare, just in case. I highly recommend this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: GTK

customer_reviews.title: Saved my tendonitis!
customer_reviews.text: What a cool product! It’s hands free and does a great job of getting all the citrus juiced. I am thrilled I found this and that it actually works bc I developed tendonitis from juicing lemons manually. *Follow up-I have used this everyday juicing a lemon for 7 months or so. Absolutely love it. Customer service is wonderful too! Quick response and took care of my issue. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Skyy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: Convenience of use and clean up. No more tired hands and arms from using a citrus reamer and muscle strength! Just cut fruit, place on top of juicing reamer, close lid and push a button. The machine raises the fruit to extract all the juice and then drops back to original position. Really nice. I just had surgery and during a long recovery wanted good quality vitamin C to help with healing. This machine didn't require me to have a lot of strength, which was an issue during convalescence. Everything except the base (motorized part) was dishwasher (top shelf) friendly. Great product. Would purchase again. Might purchase for family/friends during cold season this year (especially with COVID mess going on).
customer_reviews.author: Mother Carey

customer_reviews.title: Husband’s favorite!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. My husband would use it every morning so we can have freshly squeezed juice for breakfast and on top of that he enjoys making cocktails without mess. Its efficiency and the convenience is superb! Great job!
customer_reviews.author: MariaFK

customer_reviews.title: don't need your hand sqeeze sooo comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had used to hand spin squeezer one but still tired to squeeze to make juice four family event hough I have orange tree I barely made it. BUT this Vinci is amazing. I don't need to push nor squeeze. Just cut and put it in and the machine will make juice for you automatically. My little daughter even make it for family juice time.MY FAMILY LOVES THIS ONE.
customer_reviews.author: YANG

customer_reviews.title: Product Fail.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but after using it less than a a dozen times had latch break off from top. More of a product weakness/defect and than user any possible user error. Latch broke away from the pins to hold it. Value for money will be determined by how well customer service performs.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Broken latch on 2nd use.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a great product until the plastic latch broke during the 2nd use. Attempted to contact the seller via phone and email, with no response. Manufacture told me to go through the retailer. IF a resolution is reached, I’ll modify this review, as it really does appear to be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: AWJr

customer_reviews.title: Great product and amazing support!
customer_reviews.text: Easy, fast to use, fast to clean. After 2 months of daily use with hard big blood oranges, one part cracked. Customer service, Hannah, was amazingly prompt, quick, and they send me a replacement and improved part straight away! Great job Hannah and team!
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe Caltabiano

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!!! So happy this popped up during my amazon search for juicers!!! So quiet and very durable! I juice 2-3 bags of oranges and it never burns out or over heats as other juicers do. Hands free too!!!
customer_reviews.author: marisa mugica

customer_reviews.title: The plastic piece broke twice
customer_reviews.text: It was initially a great product. It juiced everything efficiently and worked well. Unfortunately, it broke. Twice. The plastic piece keeping the top part of the juicer to the bottom broke while juicing. We contacted vinci and they were kind enough to replace the part, but the same spot broke a week or two later. It’s unfortunate because it was really useful. Though, it doesn’t juice grapefruit well at all. The latch would detach upon squeezing a grapefruit and make juice get everywhere, which stinks. For the price, it should be better.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar Amini

customer_reviews.title: Plastic keeps breaking.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic pieces keep breaking off it. This has happened twice. We just bought it three months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really Amazing !!! It works really well ... we use it every day ... oranges are squeezed quickly and in full ... you don't get your hands dirty ... everything is done automatically by the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Only gets half of the juice out of a lime. A hand juicer is far better
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Esposito

customer_reviews.title: It may not save time, but it saves your hands!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I think I could juice it all faster myself by hand, but I am developing arthritis and I know that this is a game changer for me. I love fresh citrus juices and use them constantly, so having this and juicing a lot at one time will absolutely save my hands from the pain of manual juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: Initially this item broke. Vinci stepped up without questions and replaced the broken item with an updated part FREE of charge. Juicer works great and we are glad to have it! Kudos Vinci
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with my new Toy
customer_reviews.text: I don't remember being so satisfied with a purchase that with this Automatic Juicer. So easy to use. I love fresh squeezed citrus, from lime, lemon, orange and grapefruit. No need to add sugar, just ice to the glass. It takes out all of the pulp from the fruit. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up and quick juice
customer_reviews.text: Don’t listen to anyone and just buy it! Orange juice for the whole family has never been so quick and effortless. No more store brought processed crap out of cardboard!! If you are like me and are finicky in giving your child processed juices. It’s totally worth the price. Clean up is a breeze! Best Buy in a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great juicer, it makes it so easy to make fresh juice for my kids every day because it is quick to set up, easy to use and so easy to clean up when finished. I am really glad we chose this one, best juicer that I have ever owned! Citrus season is coming up and I am happy to experiment! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Brigid Cianfrani

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a juicer to make orange juice and grapefruit juice and we only have those hand lever squeezers that only fit a lemon. We stumbled upon this product and it’s been the best purchase decision yet. The folks who solved the nuisance of juicing that I didn’t even know I had are genius product designers. It’s really simple to use and taking it apart for cleaning is really easy. There are a lot of parts to clean but I don’t mind. We’re already planning to get this as a Mother’s Day gift this season!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Kazarians

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DESIGN, GOOD WORKING BUT POOR MATERIALS!
customer_reviews.text: This juser is functionally great and but made of poor material although is is a great design. The lock is unstable so to make a juice for an orange is great, but not for a breadfruit. This juser would be great if the lock and materials were improved.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great Citrus juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is great,it really works well on different size oranges,This juicer Is very sturdy pretty sturdy no problems with tipping it like my old one I had,Easy to use and easy to clean, I already know what I’m buying my in-laws for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I juice daily and I love this juicer. I simply cut the piece of citrus in half; put it in the machine; close the top; press the button and the juice is made. I've juiced lemons, limes, oranges and grapefruit in the past month. It knows when to stop and it is so easy to clean. I can't say enough good things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Shall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I can now drink natural OJ for breakfast everyday. What I really like is that I can do other things while oranges get squeezed, I just need to place them. My hands are cleaner as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rocío G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would be using this. However, my HUSBAND has taken over. He has so much fun. Do not hesitate. I hesitated because of price and bought several others that I returned and made decision to spend the money.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this item! I am loving it! Very easy to use and clean! Juice comes out super fast and smooth! Highly recommend this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keep It Real & 100

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!  You won’t regret it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this juicer! It’s so easy to use! You will love it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Works great for oranges!
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting to do lemons and limes as well, but not so good with the smaller fruits. They need to make additional sizes of domes to match the sizes of the fruit and this would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Brinks

customer_reviews.title: I deserved this.
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is so well designed and truly easy to use and clean that I wish the best of friends could each have one. There is no need to struggle with the problem of holding down the fruit or the irritation hands feel after dealing with the vibrations of some juicing products. A godsend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is fabulous. I have hand issues and it became impossible for me to use a manual juicer or an electric juicer with a press handle. So far I have used it for oranges, tangerines and lemons and it handles that easily. It will be interesting to see how it does with grapefruit. Since it is made of plastic components, I do think its worth the price even though the components are plastic. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: B. E.S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how this appliance is easy to use. However since it has to be closed for it to start, if my pink grape fruit is big it does not fit. So I hace to use my old manual machine. That is the only down side about this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: MLD

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice and easy machine
customer_reviews.text: Depending on the kind of oranges, it has to be cleaned a lot in between. Pitless oranges work the best.
customer_reviews.author: G. Schreuder

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact the juicing is hands free and a great solution for those with arthritis or carpal tunnel. Con is after 2 months of use and cleaning, the spout broke and not unuseable. I would expect a higher quality product for the price point
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Plastic tope of juicer get unlocked during juicing
customer_reviews.text: The secure twist feature that holds the plastic top portion of the juicer will unlock very frequently when squeezing lemons or oranges, and the top portion turns counter clockwise about 60 degrees, where the drain portion jumpalsnto the rightside of the juicer. The lock supposed to be secure to prevent the top from getting unlocked when squeezing, but it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy and efficient, makes you want to have fresh squeezed juice all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Wgl3

customer_reviews.title: Needs greater pressure to extract juice
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this was a good product especially if you have weak hands or arms as the machine does most of the work for you. The problem for me is that the unit does not exert enough pressure on the fruit to extract all the juice. Other than that, it is a good unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Eficiente, easy to clean and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love fresh squeezed citrus juice and my new juicer makes it so much easier. Most of all, exchanging it, as the first one received had a small problem, was so very easy... thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: malves

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this juicer because we love to drink freshly squeezed orange juice during the winter but it took so much time and effort with the traditional juicer, plus it was very loud. This one is very fast and very convenient, easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: C. Israel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing juicer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!!! I am juicing everyday and it’s so easy to use and clean. I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal product
customer_reviews.text: A Phenomenal product which easy to use. Extremely affective and proficient.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE P. RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when cleaning. Hinged points break easily
customer_reviews.text: Plastic hinged points break too easily. Be very careful that pour spout is locked up when removing for cleaning or reinstalling. Plastic locking clasp also broke at hinge. Can still use product with broken parts, but disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mishele Hadsell

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Automation
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except the hinge plastic connection. Made with metal connection may stronger. Enjoyed overall!
customer_reviews.author: Food Deco Art

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.  SEE UPDATE BELOW
customer_reviews.text: After having only six weeks, and using three times, the bowl cracked and then completely broke....all during use. Not a value for the money! UPDATE: customer service has been extremely helpful and has sent a replacement bowl. Will try again and, hopefully, all will work well. Really do like the ease of use and simplicity of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Joellyn Leasure

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Got 2-3 cups in 10 minutes with no sore wrists.
customer_reviews.author: immab

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Pice of junk don’t waste your money very poor engineer and not a good performance at all the parts squeaking and moving in unnatural sequence not juicing properly at all...!!!! If you looking for a quality juicer buy Breville 800cdx from ebay for chipper
customer_reviews.author: Boyko Zranchev

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have purchased sooner
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, saves so much time. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: same as above
customer_reviews.text: The juicer tires too quickly and turns off, meaning if you're making lemonade and squeezed a few lemons it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small broken part, still usable
customer_reviews.text: Slide lock at that releases the lid for cleaning broke after only 5 uses
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Van Etveldt

customer_reviews.title: Great little juice press
customer_reviews.text: Pros Works great and is quiet and small Overall a good purchase. Most pieces remover for easy cleaning Cons Could look a little more modern so it doesn’t standout in a nice kitchen. Does not work that well with small fruit like lemons and limes (unless you cut them vertically)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing every day it’s durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Marc T.

customer_reviews.title: The product is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is a little larger than i expected, so storage could be a problem if space is limited. However, the product works great. I wish the juice bowl had a larger capacity, so I didn't have to empty as often. Overall it is a good product
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer machine
customer_reviews.text: It is great one I will buy another one. But only thing that after use .I want to remove the part contact with orang. Diffecult to remove it unless I remove all part of movable part together.. But it is good one I like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It gets all the juice out in a matter of seconds. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the fact I don’t have to peel or hold the fruit is great I strongly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Courtny

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, easy on your hands, since it is sensor control.
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is amazing with sensors, nothing else to do when changing citrus sizes. One unit fits all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing juicer and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Juicer works great. Very easy to use and clean. Gets juice out of orange very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Reiswig

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer should get 100 stars—it is so awesome. Have been buying juicers for years and can’t say enough about it. So easy to use and clean. It gets every bit of juice from the orange. Am tempted to buy a second one for the future. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. It squeezes all the juice from the oranges and is easier to clean than my Jack LaLanne juicer.
customer_reviews.author: William Presser

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This Juicer is amazing! Very easy to use and works well with all types of citrus.
customer_reviews.author: Margie velasco

customer_reviews.title: The best juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best juicer I have ever owned! I have oranges and grapefruit and am SO enjoying fresh juice. I am even giving my friends fresh juice. You will not be disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but difficult to take apart
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is when you try to twist the top, in order to clean it. It's a little overly difficult to do. It should be easier.
customer_reviews.author: gary st. martin

customer_reviews.title: Very adequate equipment
customer_reviews.text: For orange juice, for now! Very easy! Enjoying glass of fresh squeezed oranges every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Berlianshik

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. I have hardly used it 5-6 times and the spring holding the lid just popped out and the flimsy plastic holding it in place cracked open. Now I have to stand there and press the lid every time. Don’t buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: A+

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best purchases I made this year! Love it
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Exceellent juicer
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to use and clean up and also its hands free operation that extracts the juice wornderful, what makes this purchase, so far, a great acquisition for our everyday use. Excellent juicer
customer_reviews.author: Evaristo A Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this citrus juicer. It was very simple to use and clean. Makes speedy work of juicing lemons or limes for recipes. It was a little pricey, but worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: SonyB

customer_reviews.title: super fast and easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with the juicer citrus, and have to say that the seller how amazon ares they wew great. And change for another new. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: np

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: This makes getting freshly squeezed juice so much faster and you get it all out easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, convenient.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, saves time. Excellent customer service too! I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Obi

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the 3 similar ones I purchased
customer_reviews.text: This electric operated juice squeezer is great! Is easy for cleaning. Few movible parts. Squeeze as deeper as the best manual operated one I used before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all juice comes out of fruit
customer_reviews.text: Juice tasted great, but didn’t get all the juice out lemons & limes. Returned & fully refunded.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Vinci Hands Free Electric Citrus Juicer excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: I've read all the reviews on this Vinci Hands Free Electric Citrus Juicer & i was hessitant in buying it. But i said why not give it a try, I've been using it every week since I got it. It's easy to use with just a push of a button your juice is ready & cleaning is easy, no more arthritis pain on my wrist from squeezing lemons, limes or oranges. I would highly recommend this product to everyone. And it looks nice in my kitchen counter it looks like a mini robot R2D2. I'm happy. :-)
customer_reviews.author: RichF

product_meta.title: Vinci Hands-Free Electric Citrus Juicer | 1-Button Easy Press Lemon Lime Orange Grapefuit Juice Squeezer Easy to Clean Juicer Machine, Black/Stainless Steel
feature_bullets: 🍊 EASY TO USE, EASY TO CLEAN - First of its kind! Simple 1-button automated press operation. Much easier to use than manual citrus press, juicers, or handheld juice squeezers. Removable parts are "top rack" dishwasher-safe.
🍋 BPA-FREE TRITAN PLASTIC JUICER BOWL - Juice reservoir holds up to 12 ounces.

🍊 WORKS WITH NEARLY ALL CITRUS FRUITS - Make your very own fresh & healthy juice! Fresh organic juice contains more vitamins and minerals with less added sugar. For use with lemons, limes, oranges, grapefruits, and other organic citrus fruits (up to 4.5 inch diameter). Great for drinks, cocktails, recipes, desserts, and marinades.
🍋 INCLUDES 2 PULP FILTERS - Low and high pulp filters are both included.
🍊 30-DAYS SATISFACTION GUARANTEE & 1-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY - Purchase with confidence!
